title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: parish, and had already ordered a timepiece froman acquaintance in Falkirk, the son of Simon Dalgliesh, farmer in Fastheugh, he could resist thetemptation to simony in another form, and thank hisnewly found friend for his disinterested offer.
